title: Implement td trace command and daemon watcher
description: Add Sprint 4 trace linking: CLI 'td trace link/scan' subcommands plus daemon watcher hooks that attach traces to tandas and update run history.

title: Automate CLI↔daemon integration test
description: Add pytest fixture that builds/runs td-daemon in a temp dir and verifies socket import fallback path, skipping when Go binary missing.

title: Implement real AI provider integrations
description: Replace placeholder Claude/OpenAI/Gemini providers with real API calls using env-configured keys and models; handle missing dependencies gracefully.

title: Plan CLI↔daemon integration tests
description: Define integration strategy for td CLI + Go daemon (socket sync, trace handling) and add initial tests once Go suite exists.

title: Add Go daemon tests
description: Cover daemon/internal db, rpc, sync packages plus watcher logic with go test to catch regressions before wiring AI features.
